data.title: Goth Style :: fashion in metal music, plus gothic culture in the mainstream
data.meta_description: Posts about Andrea Ferro written by b1kini
data.meta_site_name: Goth Style :: fashion in metal music, plus gothic culture in the mainstream
data.text:
Cristina Scabbia and Andrea Ferro share vocals in Lacuna Coil.

Studio Albums

1999 In a Reverie

2001 Unleashed Memories

2002 Comalies

2006 Karmacode

2009 Shallow Life

Cristina Scabbia has explained the backgorund to Shallow Life:

“The album feels more rock and that it is the perfect mixture between our old European sound and something more modern … some of its very heavy. The most amazing this is, we’ve been able to improve everything about Lacuna Coil without taking away anything good or doing something that doesn’t belong.”
